name: Me and H1M
description:
It's about you (the guy in yellow helmet) and your friendly drone (the blue one). His name is H1M and will protect you from bullets. Your task is to finful his power needs or he will die (kinda, it's a drone). Just Me and Him.

A collaborative experience in which you and your friend have to protect each other!

How to play

As a mechanic you have to pick up batteries which are dropped by destroyed enemy drones. There is a chance it won't drop from current enemy. Picking up batteries limits your freedom of movement and enemies can hurt you much easier.

Now it's role for second player who is playing as a drone, his task is to protect the mechanic while he is picking up the batteries for him. He can achive this by destroying enemy drones which are spawning at every wave.

The pace is fast!

Controls

If you struggle with closing game tab by pressing Ctrl + W while playing just use Shift for shooting or download the game.

Player 1 - WSAD + Space

Player 2 - Arrows + Right Control/Shift

Will you be able to get the best score?
